titleStmt.title: Moses his sight of Canaan with Simeon his dying-song. Directing how to liue holily and dye happily. By Steuen Jerome, late preacher at St. Brides. Seene and allowed.
titleStmt.author: Jerome, Stephen, fl. 1604-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T. Snodham] for Roger Iackson, and are to be solde at his shop, neare to the conduit in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: Some print faded and show-through; pages stained and torn with loss of print on 233 and 435.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop, neare to the conduit in Fleetstreete
